about_the_game:
Tip: If you want to use the English version, please switch in the LIBRARY-(right click on the game name) Proterties-General-Language to switch to English.

  • ZH group official Email : 2262941959@qq.com , You can contact us via email or the Steam community to report bugs and other issues. Thank you for your support!

  • We apologize for the absence of an English demo version at the moment; only a Simplified Chinese demo is currently available. Completing the full version to reach the True Ending takes approximately 10–12 hours. Unlocking different endings won’t take more than a week. For details on shortcut entrances to the endings, please refer to the community guide.

Desert Blossom - a yuri adventure story of young girls.

Desert elf Mars has come to the test of her own adulthood. She is encouraged by her fathers to venture out in order to inherit the position of the journey Mars got to know the kind-hearted and brave elf nun Agrace, the little fox girl Yuan Pu  (even Sensei ITO!) and the the halfling profitmaker Langer Kenser.The girls' yuri adventure begins here.

However, on the way, they found clues, extinction goddess - Viod began to wake up. She fell madly in love with and imprisoned her sister Gaia, the goddess of life. Viod will bring blood to the Baihe continent, the goal of the people to add another - stop her! Adventure then crisis...

[Basic operation] We recommend using a keyboard or gamepad for a smoother and more seamless gaming experience. ※ Note: The controller support follows the default button mapping. If you encounter any issues with compatibility, please contact us via email 2262941959@qq.com or through the Steam Community.

Shift Toggles the Walk/Run Tab key (in conversation) to review the message

Z/left mouse button to confirm/talk X/right mouse button to cancel/menu

Q Key Next W Key Previous Arrow key ↑↓←→ Control action

F2 displays frame rate F3 freely resizes the window

F4 Full Screen Game F5 Restart the game Skip dialog pagedown

  • Use the X button or the right mouse button to open the main menu. - During dialogue, press Tab to review up to the last 60 messages, or use Backpack - Key Items - Dialogue Review Book.

  • Open the Backpack - Quest or Backpack - Key Items - Quest Book to know what to do next. · The Backpack - Key Items - Enemy Book or press X during battle, then use the ↓ dropdown menu to check enemy information. Similarly, the Item Book allows you to view item, weapon, armor, and accessory stats and effects.

  • * With its easy and enjoyable combat, intuitive interaction, and rewarding collection systems, even players who are only familiar with text-based games (such as Gal, AVG, ADV, etc.) can effortlessly navigate and enjoy the gameplay.

  • 19 CG base images, 35 gallery (including split) CG available for collection.

  • 25 Character Illustration, multiple character avatars, all art resources are manually drawn without AI.

  • Nearly 30 kinds of beautiful and lovely original design Pokelike monsters! ATB combat, optimized original UI and combat effects compared to the RM engine default.

  • Large enough to explore the map, NPG interaction, 300+ items collection, gallery collection, 75kinds in enemy book collection and many other RPG unique gameplay.

  • Because the Baihe mainland is an immigrant country, you can also see characters with oriental aesthetic characteristics (Yuan Pu, Silkte, etc.). Both magic and technology, the east and the west magic together.

  • Multiple endings 4NE+1TE, 4 normal endings (2 good endings, 2 bad endings) +1 true ending. The clearance time is about 10-12h and above.

  • Tentatively implanted voice for the new TE small theater, if the response is OK, then ZH group's next JRPG, the new work will be · main story · comprehensive implantation · voice.

Group Leader & Planner: Plones Script & Production: 普伦内斯

Main program: Drill_up

Numerical planning: Maciabone (Green Pepper, Steam masterpiece "Return: Witness")

Copy editing & Proofreading: Don't worry details、小王子shigeruchan

Art: 秋葬、朽木、一世长安、树懒、柳树精、抹茶千层、Wit, Dionysus

UI: 土豆、狼姬、UI哥 Monster Designer: 熊大洲、Wit

Plug-in sequence: Drill_up, MOG, YEP, Krz, Gt50

Map material: FSM

Music material: RpgMakerMV-DLC, 音楽の卵

Production software: RPG Maker MV

Thanks for sponsorship: Xiao Jiu, Wolf Princess of Love and Justice, MOE Xin Trembling, Blank, Takashi's mother, Don't worry details

ZH RPG: This marks our first attempt at releasing a language version outside of Chinese. Due to limited resources and funding, there may still be some areas for improvement, but we have done our best to provide a high-quality experience. We also plan to create additional official channels to share updates about our progress.

We hope you enjoy our game! If the feedback is positive, we will strive to launch future games with multiple language options from the start.

【 If you choose us ZH RPG, thank you ---- Thanks~】2024/11/26 -- Plones Prennes, 2025 more new works ~ Stay tuned ~~

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better. Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

name: 沙漠花开 Desert Blossom

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: 沙漠花开 Desert Blossom - $8.99 $5.75 USD

package_groups.title: Buy 沙漠花开 Desert Blossom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: 本游戏版权由游戏原作者所有
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WindowsR 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 4 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 4GB memory recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • Additional Notes: 本游戏版权由游戏原作者所有

short_description: In the deserts of the Baihe Continent, a girl named Mars was born, breaking the curse. -- Embarking on a journey, composing an epic adventure about courage, life and love.
